name: Top down (kngparadox)
description:
Top down is a first person arcade platformer in which you must manipulate gravity to finish levels. "Top Down" was made specifically for the 2022 edition of Epic games Game Jam with theme called "As above, so below".

Features:
  • Compete with players around the world in this mind tricking game by speedrunning levels. Your score is being saved to global leaderboard.
  • Manipulate the Z vector of gravity to pass obstacles and make it to the finnish line.
  • Classic arcade vibes and catchy music will make you stay longer.
  • Intermediate difficulty - perfect for demanding players.
  • Gather power-ups for special effects and mofidiers.
Controls: InputAction
WMove ForwardSMove BackwardAMove Left
DMove RightSpacebarJumpLMBGravity ChangeFInteract
